backend/main.mo: Defines core data types for chapters, verses, moods, chatbot responses, and includes utilities plus a placeholder migration hook with partial chapter list generation.
backend/migration.mo: Contains a no-op migration function that returns the provided state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report linking a specific UI feature request to the affected frontend file and related components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise summaries of all major frontend files, describing responsibilities for pages, components, hooks, and infrastructure.
frontend/docs/APP_STRUCTURE_AND_FLOWS.md: Documentation outlining the app’s architecture, navigation flows, core components, and backend API surface.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level application shell handling tab navigation, scroll resets, global providers, and layout structure including the bottom tab bar.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Chat input component supporting text, voice dictation, dynamic placeholders, and send controls with validation.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatSafetyM: Modal presenting a safety disclaimer clarifying that the chat is not therapy or medical advice.
Renders a chat message list with different layouts for user and Krishna messages, optionally showing verses and follow-up questions.
frontend/src/components/chat/FollowUpQue: Displays a list of follow‑up question buttons that trigger a callback when clicked.
frontend/src/components/chat/MiniAskKris: A compact input widget allowing users to type and submit a message, with enter‑to‑send support.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryErro: Shows an error alert with a retry button and an optional custom message.
frontend/src/components/common/SafeImage: Renders an image with fallback handling and a placeholder if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/decorations/Flow: Placeholder decoration component that currently renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/decorations/Kris: Applies layered Krishna‑themed background images with an overlay gradient for readability.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopMenuBa: Navigation bar for switching app tabs with active state styling and a theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/settings/ThemeTo: Button that switches the app between light and dark themes using a custom theme hook.
frontend/src/components/today/TodaysWisd: Fetches and displays today's verse with loading, error, and empty states, plus a back button.
Displays a Bhagavad Gita verse with collapsible Sanskrit, translation, Gen‑Z interpretation, and action step sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout helpers, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching chapters, verses, mood-based curated verses, today's verse, and chatbot responses from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements a speech‑to‑text hook using Web Speech API with state management for listening, transcripts, and browser support.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state synced with localStorage and applies theme classes to the document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, animations, and utility classes for layout and styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/DiscoverPage: Renders a mood‑selection grid and navigates to mood detail or chat based on user selection.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/MoodDetailVi: Displays curated verses for a selected mood with loading states and a button to start a chat.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen with Krishna portrait, mini chat widget, hero section, and navigation to key app areas.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterDetai: Shows chapter info and a table of verses, handling loading, errors, and verse selection.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterListV: Renders a searchable, sortable chapter list with loading and error states, and allows selecting a chapter or viewing today's wisdom.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ReadGitaPage: Controls navigation between chapter list, today's wisdom, chapter detail, and verse detail views using internal state and session intent.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/VerseDetailV: Fetches and displays a single verse with loading and error handling, providing a back button to return to the chapter.
frontend/src/pages/TalkToKrishna/TalkToK: Implements a chat interface with Krishna, handling message flow, mood context, pending messages, and chatbot responses.
frontend/src/state/sessionContext.tsx: Provides global session state including mood, chat history, pending messages, and navigation intents with helper actions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and utilities for styling across the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current build state, issues, and pending feature requests for full verse data and expanded table rows.
